title: Ensure banner auto-slide is enabled and remove 'delivery' wording from site copy

requirements.text: Ensure the homepage banner carousel auto-slides (autoplays) by default when there are 2+ banner images configured, while keeping existing pause-on-user-interaction behavior (hover/focus/touch interaction should pause and manual next/previous controls should still work).
acceptanceCriteria: On the homepage, when `siteMedia.banners.length >= 2`, the banner advances automatically on a timer without requiring user input.
Carousel autoplay is not paused by default on initial page load.
Manual navigation (previous/next buttons and dots) continues to work and does not break autoplay.
When the user interacts (hover/focus) the carousel pauses, and it resumes afterward (current behavior preserved).

requirements.text: Remove the word "delivery" from all user-facing website copy and replace it with service-appropriate wording in English (use "on-time service" and/or "on-time setup" depending on context), ensuring the site reads like a service website.

quotes: delivery remove krde service on time kr service website hai

acceptanceCriteria: No user-facing text anywhere in the frontend contains the word "delivery" (case-insensitive).
The homepage "Why Choose Us" section replaces the phrase "on-time delivery" with "on-time service" (or "on-time setup") while keeping the sentence grammatically correct.
All updated text remains in English and matches the existing marketing tone.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (Shadcn read-only components).
Do not modify files listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep existing routes and navigation structure unchanged.
nonGoals: Adding new pages, new categories, or changing the banner images list/content beyond what is required to ensure autoplay works.
Backend changes (Motoko) are not required for these updates.
